name: Boobserman
description:
Boobserman is a titillating arcade game which can reward you with the best thing possible - the sight of half-naked sexy girls! They're here, and they're waiting for you to come and save them from their fabric prison.

So, what should you do to see the girls' charms? It's a simple task: move your building hoist and plant bombs around girls' bodies to blow up their clothes, that hide the most precious secrets. Don't worry, the explosions won't hurt any of our lovely creatures. There is a ignorant moral crusader, though, who thinks that your little game is too vulgar, that's why he tries to stop you and restore the exploded areas. But, as everybody knows, perseverance always wins!
How to play:Move around and plant bombs until you strip up a girl. Use explosive range expansion, but be careful and do not blow up yourself. Avoid bumping into your enemy, but don't miss the bonuses - the things will get smoother with them! But remember, not all of them are good for you.Features:
  • Several levels, each of them keeps the secret of one of the hotties — reveal them all;
  • Increasing difficulty will make the game more exciting, and the reward — more enjoyable;
  • One hand mode — sometimes it's extremely necessary =)
